pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculating and Visualizing ROC and PR Curves Across Multi-Class Classifications // Tools to solve real-world problems with multiple classes classifications by computing the areas under ROC and PR curve via micro-averaging and macro-averaging. The vignettes of this package can be found via https://github.com/WandeRum/multiROC. The methodology is described in V. Van Asch (2013) https://www.clips.uantwerpen.be/~vincent/pdf/microaverage.pdf and Pedregosa et al. (2011) http://scikit- learn.org/stable/auto_examples/model_selection/plot_roc.html.
